FuncDef:
The upload auto command enables a device to automatically upload performance statistics files to a server.
The undo upload auto command disables a device from automatically uploading performance statistics files to a server. The upload auto command enables a device to automatically upload performance statistics files to a server. The undo upload auto command disables a device from automatically uploading performance statistics files to a server. By default, a device is disabled from automatically uploading performance statistics files to a server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a request for uploading performance statistics files to a server.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters. The string can contain letters, digits, and underscores (_). The name must start with letters or digits.

ExtraInfo: To enable the device to automatically upload performance statistics files to the PM server at a specific interval, run the upload auto command. This configuration allows the device to automatically upload performance statistics files to the server.
